entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whiteshell
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:30 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 31. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
